lead_paragraph: Focused Technologies, hired by the state to digitize fingerprint records and other confidential material, has agreed to pay a $3.1 million settlement after illegally outsourcing the work to India.

headline.print_headline: Outsourcing by Contractor Is Said to Pose Privacy Risk
headline.main: New York State Contractor Is Said to Threaten Privacy of Millions With Outsourcing

snippet: Focused Technologies, hired by the state to digitize fingerprint records and other confidential material, has agreed to pay a $3.1 million settlement after illegally outsourcing the work to India.
abstract: New York State Inspector Gen Catherine Leahy Scott announces Focused Technologies Imaging Services has put in jeopardy privacy of around 16 million people by outsourcing, to India, $3.45 million state contract to digitize personal information, including fingerprints, of 22 million people; Focused Technologies has agreed to pay $3.1 million in penalties and fees.
